introduction: With a range of built-in and extensible Modes, Charles lets you plan, architect, code, debug and boost your productivity like never before.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.
chooseProvider: To do its magic, Charles needs an API key.
startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.title: Help Improve Charles
telemetry.anonymousTelemetry: Send anonymous error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. No code, prompts, or personal information is ever sent (unless you connect to Charles Cloud). See our <privacyLink>privacy policy</privacyLink> for more details.
telemetry.changeSettings: You can always change this at the bottom of the settings.
